response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It holds significant value to us and we believe it would be a great addition to your collection or business. We understand its worth to you is $800,000. Considering its quality, uniqueness, and the opportunity it presents, we are offering it to you for $950,000. This price reflects our commitment to fair trade while ensuring a reasonable profit for us. We look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
